attributes.action: make it illegal to be without SOAP in all public accessed toilets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am getting fed up with asking for SOAP to wash my hands with after using the toilet, it has happened in a doctors surgery (who was without SOAP for over 2 months until I purchased a bar and left it in there) restaurants (where the staff were using the same toilets as the customers) and public houses (for a wedding buffet) these venues must be told.
